mapper.update:
update curriculumplans
major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
planName = #{planname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
planDescription = #{plandescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creditRequirement = #{creditrequirement,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
courseCategory_one = #{coursecategoryOne,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
courseCategory_two = #{coursecategoryTwo,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
courseCategory_three = #{coursecategoryThree,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
courseCategory_four = #{coursecategoryFour,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
courseCategory_five = #{coursecategoryFive,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
courseCategory_six = #{coursecategorySix,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
courseCategory_seven = #{coursecategorySeven,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where curriculumPlanId = #{curriculumplanid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update curriculumplans set major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, planName = #{planname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, planDescription = #{plandescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creditRequirement = #{creditrequirement,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, courseCategory_one = #{coursecategoryOne,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, courseCategory_two = #{coursecategoryTwo,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, courseCategory_three = #{coursecategoryThree,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, courseCategory_four = #{coursecategoryFour,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, courseCategory_five = #{coursecategoryFive,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, courseCategory_six = #{coursecategorySix,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, courseCategory_seven = #{coursecategorySeven,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where curriculumPlanId = #{curriculumplanid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
